name: Holey Moley (Spadonka)
description:
Holey Moley is a game about herding animals and dodging mole holes. This game joins your play style and the difficulty together. You can play it safe and never use your ability or you can take a risk to score the most points possible. 

In Holey Moley, you control Benson, a sheepdog. All the animals have escaped their pens and you need to sort them back into the right ones by chasing them and barking at them, but be careful, the more you use your bark, the faster the animals run around! Things can quickly spiral out of control if you don't use your barking ability well.

Holey Moley was created for the 2021 GMTK GameJam.
